result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Marissa Lynn Allman

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Marissa Lynn Allman
Current: 6347 Garfield Ave, Hammond, IN 46324 United States  (Effective: 03-17-2017)
Prior: 116 W Third Street, #101, New Richmond, WI 54017

TO ALSO INCLUDE 15CM579, 15CM702, 15CM704, 15CM734, 15CM756, 15FO520, 16CM21, 15CM428 and 16CM53:
CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:   Megan E. Kelly   DF ATTY:  Julie A. Weber   DF:  Marissa Lynn Allman appeared from jail. Case called at 8:48 a.m. ADA Kelly states there is a joint agreement. State has complied with victims rights. Recites recommendations.   Court reads charge and maximum penalty. DE pleads GUILTY to Ct 1 in 15CM704 Credit Card-Fraudulent Use. DE pleads GUILTY to Ct 1 Bail Jumping-Misd. & Ct. 2 Theft Movable Property in 16CM21. DE sworn. Crt reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Crt finds DE freely, voluntarily and knowingly waives rights and makes plea. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Crt accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 1 in 15CM704  and Ct's 1 and 2 in 16CM21. On motion of the State, Crt dismisses 15FO520 outright. All remaining counts and files dismissed and read in. Sentencing arguments. Crt orders:

In case 15CM704, Ct. 1:

- S/W 1 year probation. 33 days jail credit if probation is revoked. 

- Restitution in the amount of $435.00 to be paid to victims. Joint and several with co-defendants

- Completion of MRT

- Complete all other programming as deemed appropriate by the COMPAS assessment and the Department of Corrections

- Court costs and DNA Surcharge


In case 16CM21:

- DNA Sample

- Ct's 1 and 2. 33 days jail on each count and run concurrent. 33 days credit. TIME SERVED.

- Ct's 1 and 2. Misd. Court costs and DNA surcharge on each count.

TO ALSO INCLUDE 15CM579, 15CM702, 15CM704, 15CM734, 15CM756, 15FO520, 16CM21 and 16CM53: 
CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle.ADA:   Megan E. Kelly   DF ATTY:  Julie A. Weber   DF:  Marissa Lynn Allman appeared from jail. Case called at 4:14 a.m. ADA Kelly states that 5 of these cases need an initial appearances on 15CM579, 15CM702, 15CM704, 15CM734 and 15FO520. Atty Weber has copies of the criminal complaints. NG to 15FO520 and requesting to tag along. NG to counts in 15CM579. NG to counts in 15CM702. NG to counts in 15CM704. NG to counts in 15CM734. Branch 1 has file 15CM428 and Atty Weber requesting the file be transferred to this branch. Court will check with EJL. No objection by the state for file to be transferred to Branch 4. ADA Kelly requesting bond to stay in place. Bond will remain.  Plea hearing scheduled for February 4, 2016 at 08:30 am.

***AMENDED***

TO ALSO INCLUDE 16CM21 and 15CM756:

-   It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Kerry F. The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

-  It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, New Richmond McDonalds.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.
 DE may enter McDonalds to pick up final paycheck

Further, it is ORDERED that if the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bailjumping contrary to Sec. 946.49(1)(a), Wis. Stats.

TO ALSO INCLUDE 16CM21 and 15CM756:
CO: RMW, REP: Drost, CLERK: Liddle. ADA:   Megan E. Kelly   DF ATTY:  Julie A. Weber   DF:  Marissa Lynn Allman appeared from jail. Case called at 2:34 p.m.  Court notes Atty Weber has filed a notice to modify bond on 15CM756. Atty Weber gives argument. ADA Kelly objects to signature bond.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG to both charges.  Waives speedy trial. State is also requesting a NC with the McDonalds in New Richmond.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 03:30 pm.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO ABUSIVE CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Kerry F.  The term "abusive contact" is hereby defined as a verbal assault or an intentional infliction of or threat to inflict physical pain, physical injury or illness, an impairment of physical condition, and /or sexual contact or sexual intercourse without consent. CO: RMW, RPR: Erin Drost, CLERK: E. Ferrill, ADA:   Megan Kelly,  DF ATTY:  Joseph Caton, DF:  Marissa Lynn Allman appeared from jail via video.   QUASH WARRANT. Includes 15CM756, 15CM702, 15CM704, 15CM579, 15CM428, 15CM734 & 15FO520.Court confirms address.   Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading.  NG on 15CM756.  Waives speedy trial.  Bond reinstated in form and amount on open cases. State is asking for a CB, Atty Caton argues.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for January 28, 2016 at 03:30 pm.
